WRITING.TITLE: Multiplayer Player count
WRITING.TEXT: I really want to get a Rift soon but what i'm worried about, is the player count in games like Onward for example. Steamcharts shows me that there are only \~30 players right now. Are there more players that are not shown because of the rift store? Or can i expect no more players as soon as i get it? Also is there a way to see the amount of players via rift store somewhere?

WRITING.TITLE: Turning of Monsters
WRITING.TEXT: Does anybody know if it is possible to turn off the Hostile monsters in NMS? I really want to play this game in VR once it's available but especially the biological horrors freak the s**t out of me even in non vr. I really think that these might destroy my VR experience for this game which would be sad since I'm really looking forward to explore the worlds in VR
But they will still spawn right? #129300;
Damn :D Looks like i have to overcome my fear then

Had that in subnautica. When i started and didn't know that it will be terrifying as hell i just stayed in the starting realm for like 10 hours. Later i was just like whatever on everything. I hope i'll get that in NMS too. Just started playing yesterday and just like in subnautica, I didn't know about creepy monsters :D

Got it 2 days ago and played 12 hours straight. Not much games can keep me playing that long without a break. I can't really tell what i like about this game but I guess it's a mix of exploring endless worlds and building nice bases. If u played minecraft and you liked the concept, u will love this one
In the world means in the current universe ingame right? Or in our real world? #129300;

WRITING.TITLE: Turning around in VR
WRITING.TEXT: I want to get a VR headset soon but i have 1 question: How do you turn around in VR? Do you have to physically turn around or is there an option to turn around with the thumbsticks? I can imagine that the cables can get very annoying when you walk up a staircase for example so you have to turn around many times in one direction. Was thinking about some weird moving overhead construction to help me out with that but there must be another option.
Ah thats great news. Thank you :)
I will change to that later i guess. Need to figure out how to manage the cables though. Maybe a fan like construction that turns with me so the cables don't get weird after a few turns
I'll give that a try :)

I'm not entirely sure but i think you have to get some resources from outside of the sea emperors area. I remember collecting some plants to craft the enzyme thing. Then you can return to the sea emperor.
you will get the blueprint if u follow the story
Didn't know about these. With these tools my construction would be pretty much useless since i can unwist my cables easily :)
plus since i don't know how motion sick prone i am at least turning won't be a problem then, when i can do it physically
Stop crying its free
I don't know about missions to upgrade your suit but on the Planets there are capsules where you can do so. And i'm not sure but sometimes you can buy the upgrades on the space stations i think
which files do i have to back up?
Ok thank you :)
Yep i found it on the location you gave me :)

WRITING.TITLE: Who thought powering your base would be fun?
WRITING.TEXT: I can't build an electromagnetic reactor because the next spot is like 1500u away from my base and wiring from one base computer to another is not possible. So 20 solar modules or no electricity.

The problem is that the EM generator produces constant energy while the solar modules don't. And for some reason the solar modules sometimes don't work even if there's enough light. And i'm not sure but I think they don't work when you are in a different system so if i use the teleporter to quickly get something from my base i have to wait until there's enough energy to use the teleporter back
Ye i might try that later.

WRITING.TITLE: Performance with GTX1070
WRITING.TEXT: I will get my rift s soon and i really want to know how much FPS can i expect in games like Skyrim Vr and Pavlov. I will probably stick to singleplayer games but I might hop over to multiplayer sometimes so every game is appreciated :) My setup: Gtx 1070 I7 8700 16 Gb ram

We are no company. It's just the website from our Uni group and usually it's just putting up Job postings and Pictures from our activities and so on. So really easy stuff normally :D Just sometimes it can get a bit difficult when stuff like this happens :)
That's great to hear because it's my favorite non Vr game rn :)

So i made a backup and disabling redux is not an option since this pretty much destroys the design of the website (thank god i made a backup). Going back to PHP 7.1 seems to work here but my host will automatically update all PHP 7.1 versions to PHP 7.2 in 2 months so i need to find another solution until then :/ Any other ideas?
I love this one. If not my room was full of displates already :/

yes i will. I'm just hoping I don't have to go to the toilet then :D was a close call last time

WRITING.TITLE: DayZ like VR game?
WRITING.TEXT: Does anyone know if there is a game like DayZ on any VR platform? The closest i could find was Arizona Sunshine but i'm looking for a real open world with realistic weapon mechanics like in Pavlov or Onward etc

Would be so cool if we had an escape from tarkov like game where you have realistic weapon handling and customization mixed with dayz open world and base building. No mans sky shows that it would be possible scalewise. Such a shame nearly no AAA company does VR titles yet because they would have the budget.

I already thought about that but I'm just scared the cannibals will freak me out too much in VR since I'm scared REALLY fast in those kind of games and I absolutely hate it :D. I even get goosebumps when in a minecraft cave on a normal monitor. Might consider this in friendly mode though

Yeah from the ground would probably be better. Can even be a singleplayer game with Ai but i think this feeling being in a Post apocalyptic game on yourself and always looking for stuff to survive would be soo awesome

I found a game that is not entirely open world but seams to be the right direction from what i've seen so far. It's called Surv1v3. It has a story mode and says that it has large and explorable areas which would be a step in the right direction at least
yeah but the tittie monster or whatever that is really scares me from videos alone so i don't think i'll get along with this :D Might try it anyway
This is so awesome man :D Can you upload these separately so i can make them my phone wallpapers? :)

WRITING.TITLE: Downwards Compatibility
WRITING.TEXT: When Oculus will announce a 2.0 headset, do you think that current gen headsets will be still able to play 'next gen' games? Or do you think they will do the consoles move and you have to buy a new headset for newer games? I am talking about rift/rift s here. Yeah i had the same issue. Kinda dumb this is actually the problem

WRITING.TITLE: Why would you get the rift s now?
WRITING.TEXT: When the Quest gets Pc support and Hand tracking which the Rift s doesn't seem to get from what i've read, what is the point of the rift s when oculus doesn't seem to care for it at all? It's kinda mean for everyone that got a rift s when the Quest now is better in every aspect or am i getting something wrong here? Edit: And is there any reason there is no hand tracking for rift s?

They said on Instagram that the rift s is still better in graphics and performance and that games like medal of honor will still be exclusive on the rift platform. And yeah i'm pissed too that they did nothing new for the rift but I would wait until link is out and how good it really is.
How much else do you have plugged in to your Bluetooth connections on your PC? Try to unplug some of them. That helped for me
Rift s is still better
Trust me playing vr drunk is no good idea #128514;

Sadly that's true but it's still awesome. I just see new players in games which will be awesome even for rift users. And tbh Hand tracking will be nothing but a nice gimmick and nothing else. But sad anyways
I mean you might be fine but i threw up last time i tried that. And I wasn't that drunk to throw up from drinking alone
Lets just say i had to clean my floor after that :D

It does NOT basically become a Rift. There will be way more latency and lower performance than the Rift. And hand tracking is just nice for a few tech demos and nothing else. Don't expect to play shooters or so with that. So Rift S is still better for most Pcvr games
I'm the same but my mic is still muted atm :/ Maybe one day :)
Who is Joe?
not sure but might be Crucible Vermillion

WRITING.TITLE: (Not sure if this is the right sub) So all my Passwords got hacked(?)
WRITING.TEXT: So let's just say i was on some Websites i don't want to talk about and 1 or 2 days after i get plenty of emails that someone logged into some of my accounts (Epic, Origin,Twitch etc.). I changed all my passwords (or maybe i should say i used the same for all and i scanned my PC for Viruses (I use ESET) and didn't find any. Now is this maybe a bad coincidence or do i now have some Viruses on my PC so i need to reset the entire thing? Pls help

At the website i didn't use any password since i didn't log in there. And yeah i changed the Passwords now and when i have time i will set up a PW manager. I have 2FA pretty much everywhere (except Twitch until now). So u think its not a virus? I also just did what the pinned post at this sub says but this method didn't find anything either. I it might be brute force but every log in try was from a completely different IP (I'm aware that these Bots ir hackers don't use their own ips but on every try a different one?)
Yeah i've done that one. So let's hope I'm fine now.

WRITING.TITLE: Best game to get first for Christmas?
WRITING.TEXT: So i will get a rift S this Christmas and really can't decide what game to get first. It should be good for showing VR to my family (they won't play much as i know them. Most likely i will play and they will watch) but still be fun after that. I already bought Pavlov and Skyrim VR but I also want a proper VR singleplayer game. So I scrapped down my list to these 3 games: Boneworks Arizona Sunshine Robo recall Motion sickness is no problem for me i already tested that with a friend's headset
Sure new recommendations are also welcome. I will check that one out. And do u mean Vivecraft? Isn't that the minecraft mod which is free anyway?
I think u might mean Viveport? Is there any difference in quality, compared to when u normally buy the games?

Yeah probably like with Skyrim and Oblivion for me. I really loved oblivion until i got skyrim. After that i couldn't play it anymore. Like someone else said, i will probably go with the viveport trial and play arizona sunshine first and after that i will go to other games.
Just watched the movie and i was just blown away how good it was in ending the saga. Definitely in my top 3 Star wars movies ever.
This is 100% accurate

WRITING.TITLE: Is map rotation still broken or am i just unlucky
WRITING.TEXT: So all i'm getting is Picadilly, Azhir Cave and Petrograd. I couldn't even name the other maps since i maybe got them 1 time in like 70 hours of gameplay. So is this because the system is garbage or am i just unlucky?
Try disconnecting everything on your Bluetooth ports you don't need. That fixed it for me. Edit: I mean USB ports

Sorry i mean USB Ports. I had a Wlan antenna and a BT dongle connected but i didn't use them anyway and that fixed it for me. You can also try a USB PCIE card. Most of the rifts issues are because of the USB ports not getting enough power

It is good but i don't know if its a game to start with. It was my first VR game and when ur not used to it if feels a bit weird imo. I'm having a blast in skyrim and im not wiggling until the enemies die but doing 1 or two hits and then dodge or block. feels way better imersionwise. I recommend using VRIK for immersion so u can draw weapons without opening menus every time and you even have a proper body
I'm having a blast with Skyrim VR rn. Some mods are necessary though.

WRITING.TITLE: Rift s right controller only working with one specific battery
WRITING.TEXT: So i got a Rift s for christmas and i ordered some rechargeable batteries (eneloop pro). They work just fine on my left controller but the right one doesn't even turn on with these. It only seems to work with the batteries that were included with the Rift. Is my controller faulty or is there any way to fix this?

"Since other batteries work fine in the Right controller, that tells us it isn't the controller even though the Eneloop Pro batteries work in the left, it is strange but means different battery will have to be used in the right controller." So it works for everybody else just not for you so just spend 10$ for batteries every week Nice one Oculus Support. If it works for everybody else just not for me it is very likely NOT the batteries fault. So was your co-worker just not willing to help me and someone else can or do i have to look for another VR headset since i can pretty much buy a more expensive one if i have to spend 10$ a week for batteries now.

Ok so i just took out all rechargeable batteries i could find in my house and the only ones that seem to work are those from "VARTA". So since i can use these my problem is kinda solved. But how come that you get these reports just recently and only on the right one? Was there anything changed in design on newer models?
How much USB devices have you plugged in?

WRITING.TITLE: Are there any (body) scar meshes to download?
WRITING.TEXT: TLDR: I need some scar meshes to paste to a character in bodyslide So first of all I have no idea about modding. What i want to do is to add some scars/birthmarks etc to my follower sofia in Skyrim VR. I have noticed that there are some really good mods out there for RaceMenu but since that doesn't work and i'm not sure if you can customize followers with this anyway, i was looking for another solution. I tried experimenting with bodyslide and it seems that this might be the solution I was looking for. For testing purposes i copied the wounded meshes from one character and it kinda worked. So now i'm looking for some scar meshes to download and paste to sofia body. Is there any way to get these somewhere?

WRITING.TITLE: Is my Rig usage normal?
WRITING.TEXT: So i noticed, that when playing VR my CPU and GPU usage barely ever goes above 50%. This wouldn't be a problem when the frames still would be at 80 fps (I'm playing on Rift s) but when the frames drop it should get higher or am i wrong? At most games it's fine most of the time as far as I can tell but at certain points it gets annoying. I tested Skyrim, B amp;S, Pavlov, and Twd:S amp;S. My Rig: GTX 1070 I7 8700 16 GB DDR4 MSI Z370 Tomahawk And yeah i know my GPU just meets the requirements for VR but still it should get to 100% usage or not? Will it maybe help to upgrade anything? Any help is welcome

Here an there in all of them but where i noticed it the most was Blade and sorcery. When Turing i could see black bars on the edges to a degree it was still playable but nit very enjoyable so I had to refund it unfortunately. VTOL also but it's early access too and nit that bad so i can live with that. The Walking dead had it here and there but still ok and skyrim is a bit meh in certain areas too.
So if I'm getting you right my problem isn't about GPU usage but the frame time required for smooth gameplay and a new GPU will fix that?

It's just so annoying. And they tend to ignore emails as well. Once it took me 3 emails for them to respond

It never ended. I was having issues with the game because of a bug that deleted progress from like 3 days or so. And since i read here that the time limit of 20 days I was having is really hard to reach anyway i was asking for more time to do this offer. They never responded so i just gave up and did it anyways
Same
nope

WRITING.TITLE: Swagbucks is scamming and ignoring me please help
WRITING.TEXT: I try to contact them for 2 weeks now because I didn't get credited for a 40$ offer and i haven't gotten any response yet except for the automatic one. So I decided to ask them on Facebook for help and they responded they are sorry for my problem and sent me a link to guess what: customer support. So basically they told me to ask customer support for help with customer support. I think I will quit this bs site and look for one that's actually paying you.
Actually no but the email didn't tell me to do so either. It just tells me they have all the information they need and it will take up to 10 business days
Ok I'll do that then. I can't hurt I guess. Thank you for the advise

gt;You have to look at what YOU did, or didn't do, to understand the response you're getting from them. Well yeah I would if i would get any response at all. When you run a site which offers support you should answer when someone has questions and not be expecting someone to solve quantum physics equations before even considering answering because that's not how good customer support works. If you didn't have a problem yet then fine good for you. But reading through this reddit i see A LOT of people complaining about customer service playing hide and seek. And it's not always the case sure. I've had one problem and it was solved in not even a day but but this is just ridiculous
Who said this would be bad because of the leaks? I f***ing told you this is stupid

WRITING.TITLE: I'm laughing so hard rn at the "get woke go broke" guys who thought this game was shit.
WRITING.TEXT: From the beginning i said we should wait until the game is out but I was laughed at. We'll now I'm laughing
I always wanted a depressing game. I think there aren't enough out there.
Yeah I'll leave them alone. I don't want to be as idiotic as they were when the leaks came out (although i have proof they are wrong now which they didn't have)

It's not about the people who didn't think it would be good. It's about the people that insisted it will be bad no matter what and kept spoiling things to "protect" others from buying it. Most of them where trolls anyway who probably didn't even want to or aren't able to play it in the first place

Yeah 200 "paid reviews" and the one that says something slightly negative confirms the game is the worst in the universe. But if they insist on that opinion they didn't deserve this game anyways. I mean if you go in with that mindset you will always find something you don't like

I read the leaks too but i didn't find them too bad that i would just mindlessly hate on the game. I wanted to wait for the whole product and not concentrate on certain parts that were intended to make the game look bad cuz thats the point if you hack a studio, you want to make them look bad. Like troy baker said it's a game and you have to experience it. And most of the leaks weren't confirmed either so yeah
good i'm not the only one. Thought i got a virus or something

WRITING.TITLE: Isn't the customizable Always on display not available for P20 Pro?
WRITING.TEXT: I just got the update to Emui 10.0 but i don't find the option for the customizable Always on Display. This was pretty much the only feature i was hyped for since the other changes are pretty small imo.
Are there Adidas clothes in baby size? Asking for a friend
That is the cutest thing i have ever seen
So basically earth right now

I would even replay the game right now if i didn't knew i had to play as a character i don't like for 10 hours or so. For me it was really exhausting and I had to push myself to continue playing. I really love ND but if you have 10 hours where you have to force yourself to continue it's just not a good game. I liked the end though where ellie concluded with her past and broke the circle of violence like ND calls it even though i REALLY wanted to kill her and even kept smashing square after the scene was over. I just hope in the next game (which should come I guess) they stick to ellie and don't force any characters you hate. I get what they were trying to do but it didn't work.

I loved it too i think(?) i have to sleep over it to make a conclusion but i like the turn they did in the end. even though i kept smashing square at the water scene after it was over so if i had to decide it would have ended different. i guess you know what I mean if you finished it. However i found the last half of the game really exhausting because I just didn't care. That part really put me down a little on my excitement. The rest was pretty good however
I never felt so empty like after this game

Yes pls I need her to be happy in the end. Neil Druckman talked about making a part 3 and i can't imagine they will take a different character for this. So if the backlash for part 2 isn't too big i guess they will make one more
I really hope so because they were so beautiful
100% agreed
No hate here just a serious question: how did the cutscene give a reason to let abby live?
That makes very much sense and i think i get it now. Thank you

WRITING.TITLE: How many "optional" sequences have you encountered?
WRITING.TEXT: The only one that had a cutscene where i knew it was optional was the guitar scene in the music shop in the beginning. But that can't be the only one when they teased it so much right?

That would be very upsetting since they made a whole video about those sequences. I liked the optional storytelling by the world like the bank one but from what they said i really expected huge emotional cutscenes and longer scenes that "go into the building find dead bodies and a note and that's it"

I feel exactly the same. I finished it yesterday night and was not really sure about it. But sleeping about it and thinking about it i really like it actually. And I really wish for a part 3 cuz I don't want Ellies story to end that depressing

I would give it a really really solid 8/10 because there were parts that I really hated (although I think we were actually supposed to hate it). It's a very good game though. The emotions this one got out of me... Man i didn't even know I had these emotions
Can i be your girlfriend?

I strongly disagree. They can't just end many peoples favorite character with this ending. Not again. There has to be a happy conclusion in the end or else everyone would be even more pissed if they ended her story on that. I feel like Ellie was always the main protagonist so she also has to end the series. Not saying I wouldn't like spin offs but that can't be the end for ellie or the series would always have a bitter taste you don't want to remember. I liked the game and the ending fit very well imo but only for this game and not the series
I don't know maybe looking for Dina or the remaining fireflies to actually make the cure now Joel's gone. Whatever they do i just can't imagine them ending a series like that.

Yeah a spin off would be great. Especially about Joel to calm the tides that are going on right now. They could show what he and Tommy did for survival since they talk about it but never show it and why they split up. The whole world has just so much potential even for new characters. But i desperately want a happy conclusion first for a beloved character that has gone through so much pain like Ellie did

WRITING.TITLE: I see what you did there

WRITING.TEXT: I think its a funny little easter egg. The fact he put himself as a villain here (although many people see him as that after part 2 maybe a little foreshadowing that he knew some would hate it) makes it seem very ironical so it's fine for me.
Yeah ikr?
I think i even remember an interview where he said thr game will be very controversial

Me too but I just needed more of this game since the story fucked me up so much i just couldn't do anything else. I wanted to watch netflix after but after the intro i was like fuck it this isn't it and turnt on my ps4 again

Man i wish i could give it a 10/10 too but the ending was way too sad and unsatisfying for me. If i knew there was a sequel that makes everything good in the end and not make Ellie loose literally everything i would consider a 10/10 too. It's not because it was badly written or smth and they got me right where they wanted me to be, i think (mild depression and emptiness). But for a 10/10 i want to be happy after a game or at least not that broken. Like i said if there's some follow up and i knew this was not the definitive end that might change my opinion cuz this just can't be the end for ellie
I tried some YouTube videos but i can't stop thinking about this game

I mean Neil mentioned they want to make a part 3 so i sure do hope this part is not entirely about Abby looking for fireflies and Ellies story is done. I could imagine Part 3 beeing about Ellie and maybe there will be a spinoff for Abby. Or maybe a DLC about Abby and the Fireflies and Part 3 concluding Ellies story

I really think it made me temporarily depressed a little bit. At least yesterday after finishing it, it felt like that. Almost like someone broke up with you or so. But i think that's positive for the game if it can give you this kind of feelings. I can't think about another game that made me so emotional besides this and Part 1

I completely get you except the girlfriend part. I am not very emotional normally and this game and part 1 showed me emotions I didn't know I had before. After this game i just wanted to squeeze my face into my pillow and cry. I can't remember when I did that the last time tbh maybe in 6th grade when i got my first F or so and that was like 10 years ago. It just has to be a great game for that emotional aspect alone. Yeah some posts here really helped me to get a better understanding of the story and appreciate it even more but the majority here doesn't help. It's even worse on Twitter. I guess we just have to stick to our opinion until people calmed down a little and more have finished it.

thank you. Right after finishing it i really wasn't sure what to feel and I was just confused about that but after thinking about it for a while i came to the conclusion that this was really close to what I felt

Maybe this idea is really stupid but maybe Abby and Ellie will meet again on this one and Abby finds a way to make a cure without killing Ellie after finding the remaining Fireflies since she learned a lot from her father so Ellie can finally have her life matter like she wanted it to. Maybe completely forgiving Joel and living a happy life with Dina and JJ in the end.
Actually thinking more about it I'm pretty sure it will be about Ellie and Dina. Otherwise they wouldn't have talked that much about their relationship in the last flashback
Damn you're right i didn't notice that lol

I don't even know if acting for games is considered for the Oscar but she really deserves it i think
I sure hope there will be a happy ending. I enjoyed the darker tone of part 2s ending but only for part 2 not as the series ending. There just has to be a happy conclusion to this

I was thinking about her sacrificing herself too but that would make part 1 completely obsolete. Maybe they will find a way for a cure without killing her. Maybe even with Abbys help since she learned from her father

I would love Tlou games that tell a completely different stories since there is so much potential but i would like them to finish Ellies story first since she started it all. And I would buy any ND game so yeah would buy anyway

WRITING.TITLE: Customer service appreciation post
WRITING.TEXT: A week ago my Displate fell of the wall and they immediately offered me new magnets and a new Displate because mine got a little scratch at the bottom. And since i feel a little bad to get a new one after 2 years and the scratch is very small i told them i don't necessarily need a replacement. After that any other support would stop offering a replacement but they again told me they would ship me one for free. This is by far the best customer service I have ever had.
I kinda feel bad if they send a new one because they are so nice. Maybe I ask for a discount on my next purchase instead
Not with the same leaf because the glue won't hold that good anymore but after mine fell off I just nailed the magnet onto the wall so if you don't mind a small nail in your wall that works perfectly
If they fix charging rings and battery life I'm happy

WRITING.TITLE: Can someone explain Bottlenecking to me?
WRITING.TEXT: I get that at some point let's say the CPU will bottleneck the GPU so it can't run at full potential. But I've read so often now that getting a higher resolution monitor actually helps. How is that possible since there is even more power needed?

Oh ok so it's actually about aligning the possible fps the 2 can produce? So if I got this right it's not that the GPU can't produce more fps because of the Cpu bottlenecking but about only seeing 300 fps because that's what the CPU gives us? Like the GPU still technically can output the 300 fps but we just see the lowest the whole Pc can produce
ok i kinda get what you explain

I was always thinking the GPU can't produce more power because of the bottleneck but from what I understand in this post they still work independently but obviously what we see is the lowest that the worst component can display? So the GPU could still produce more fps but we can't see them because the CPU only displays less?
That's true but this kinda stuff messes with their reputation a lot. And why not support actual customers but instead moneyhungry subhumans. They make the same money nonetheless

WRITING.TITLE: Auto cannons destroy the game for me
WRITING.TEXT: I have no problems beeing owned by someone more skilled than me and I don't even care losing as long as the game is fun but as soon as someone shoots at me with these things from across half the map there is no chance to get away
The main problem is with the starfighter battles. When you get shot constantly and you don't even know where you are shot from you stand no chance. In fleet battles its balanced better i guess
Tbh I would ask for a refund. Some people collect these boxes so you could get some money back or a new bix at least.
does the glass fit or do you really have to squeeze it? want to get the same combination
